nodes.text: Thaereian Security Facility Number 12 was a security facility that was located in Gadrin, on Cularin.

The facility was run by the Gadrin branch of the Office of Peace and Security prior to the Clone Wars. However, during the conflict it was taken over by the Thaereian military and Elis' Gan was made the facility's commandant. A military force called Task Force Pest was established to arrest Force-sensitive individuals on Cularin, and under the command of Lieutenant Dalin they took their prisoners to the security facility, where Force-blocking drugs were tested on them. However the Heroes of Cularin, who had been hired by the Cularin Militia, were able to infiltrate the facility and free some of the prisoners.
